export JAVA_HOME={{java64_home}} export JAVA=${JAVA_HOME}/bin/java
export DRILL_PID_DIR={{drill_run_dir}} export DRILL_LOG_DIR={{drill_log_dir}} export DRILL_CONF_DIR={{drill_config_dir}}
DRILL_MAX_DIRECT_MEMORY="{{drill_max_direct_memory}}" DRILL_HEAP="{{drill_heap_size}}"
export DRILL_JAVA_OPTS="-Xms${DRILL_HEAP} -Xmx${DRILL_HEAP} -XX:MaxDirectMemorySize=${DRILL_MAX_DIRECT_MEMORY} -XX:ReservedCodeCacheSize=1G -Ddrill.exec.enable-epoll=true"
